value:
$WmMPID_リョウマ,ch05_01_Ryouma_M_Normal,Face|$w0|What's that, you say? My realm
is being controlled by forces
from another world?$k$pPreposterous! The Kingdom of
Hoshido is protected from invasion
by the power of our queen.$k$pI'm not sure how you got into
Hoshido, but rest assured, my family
and I will make sure you leave!$k$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_リョウマ,ch05_01_Ryouma_M_Normal,Face|$w0|My family, I underestimated the
power of these strangers. We
must retreat and regroup.$k$pFor the sake of our people,
we cannot let Hoshido fall into
the hands of the invaders!$k$Sbs150|
